acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Material was acquired from Katryn Miller in 2005.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The collection contains materials pertaining to the Loudoun Station development in Loudoun County, Virginia. Loudoun Station is a mixed-use town center development on approximately 50 acres located adjacent to the Dulles Greenway in Ashburn. It comprises office space, pedestrian-friendly retail establishments, and multi-family residences. A transit-oriented development, it will eventually combine office, residential, hotel, restaurant, retail and civic uses, all adjacent to the final METRO station on the planned extension of METRO's Silver Line.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection details the early developing stages of the Loudoun Station project. Collection comprises correspondence, reports, zoning materials, maps, and design materials.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged according to subject.
